original_text: Because of you, people in many places have clearly heard the message about the Lord. It is not only the people in Macedonia and in Achaia who have heard it. People everywhere now know how you trust God. So, as we travel to different places, we do not need to tell people anything. Because of you, people in many places have clearly heard the message about the Lord. It is not only the people in Macedonia and in Achaia who have heard it. People everywhere now know how you trust God. So, as we travel to different places, we do not need to tell people anything.
korean_text: 주의 말씀이 너희에게로부터 마게도냐와 아가야에만 들릴 뿐 아니라 하나님을 향하는 너희 믿음의 소문이 각처에 퍼졌으므로 우리는 아무 말도 할 것이 없노라

sentences.original_text: have clearly heard the message about the Lord
It is not only the people in Macedonia
and in Achaia who have heard it
now know how you trust God
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희가 어떻게 하나님을 신뢰하는지 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: So, as we travel to different places
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리가 여러 곳을 여행할 때
